fulltext:
HIEU PHAN
(+84) 1649 561 780
PROFILE
I have a B.S. in Computer Science and have been working as professional web developer for 5
years. 
I'm experienced in most of stacks of web development, including front-end, back-end
development and DevOps.
Currently I'm seeking a position of Full Stack Web Developer in a thriving, exciting, and growing
company 
DETAILS
(+84) 1649 561 780
ptrhieu.it@gmail.com
https://hieuphan.com
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY

(https://www.coinhako.com)
April 2017 – Present

March 2018 – December 2018

(https://www.nustechnology.com)

September 2010 – September 2014
Degree: Bachelor of Engineer
Graduated with honor
PORFOLIO
Coinhako (https://www.coinhako.com)
The digital assets wallet service for people in Asia to buy, sell and secure their digital assets
Coursedy (https://coursedy.com)
An Online E-learning Platform that connects students and teachers all over Vietnam
ShareGrid (https://losangeles.sharegrid.com)
ShareGrid is a marketplace where people benefit from posting their camera listings for others to
rent. ShareGrid is a transactional and secured web application. It makes rentals go smoothly and
safely with advanced identity verification, insurance, and payment systems.
LINKS
SKILLS
Ruby, Ruby on Rails
Restful Api, Microservices
Single Page Application using React
JS, BackboneJS, Angular 1
Devops (AWS, GCP, Kubernetes,
Terraform, docker, Heroku)
HTML, CSS, Responsive UI, HAML,
SLIM
Git work flow
Jooto (https://app.jooto.com)
Jooto is a Project Management tool, which allows users to keep track of their tasks,
communicate and share files of their projects. Jooto is a high traffic and real-time web app,
which requires strict performance optimization and resources management
Rally Navigator (https://www.rallynavigator.com)
Rally Navigator is a Google-map based application. It allows travelers to draw, edit and print
roadbooks for their trips.
